# Save the date

<font size="4">
CEN 2023 will be the 6th Conference of the Central European Network and take place from <br> 
<b>September $3^\text{rd}$ to $7^\text{th}$ 2023 at [Biozentrum](https://www.biozentrum.unibas.ch) in [Basel](https://www.basel.com)</b>.
</font>

It is a joint biometric conference of

* the [Austro-Swiss Region (ROeS)](https://www.ibs-roes.org),
* the [German Region (DR)](http://www.biometrische-gesellschaft.de) and
* the [National Group Poland](https://ii.uni.wroc.pl/~aba/gpol_ibs.html)

of the [International Biometric Society (IBS)](https://www.biometricsociety.org).
